Gene.FullName: lncRNA sorafenib resistance in renal cell carcinoma associated
progestin and adipoQ receptor family member 9
transient receptor potential cation channel subfamily C member 1
U2 snRNP associated SURP domain containing

SubmitterDescription.SubmitterName: International Standards For Cytogenomic Arrays Consortium (ISCA)

ClinicalAssertion.StudyDescription: Copy number variation identified through the course of routine clinical cytogenomic testing in postnatal populations. Clinical assertions have been curated as described in Kaminsky et al. 2011.
ClinicalAssertion.Comment: Copy number variation identified through the course of routine clinical cytogenomic testing in postnatal populations. Clinical assertions have been curated as described in Kaminsky et al. 2011.
